00013 - (id)initWithTitle:(NSString *)title delegate:(id)delegate cancelButtonTitle:(NSString *)cancelButtonTitle okButtonTitle:(NSString *)okayButtonTitle
00014 {
00015         
00016     if (self = [super initWithTitle:title message:@"\n" delegate:delegate cancelButtonTitle:cancelButtonTitle otherButtonTitles:okayButtonTitle, nil])
00017     {
00018         UITextField *theTextField = [[UITextField alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(12.0, 45.0, 260.0, 25.0)]; 
00019         theTextField.backgroundColor = [UIColor clearColor];
00020                 theTextField.textColor = [UIColor whiteColor];
00021                 theTextField.keyboardType = UIKeyboardTypeAlphabet;
00022                 theTextField.keyboardAppearance = UIKeyboardAppearanceAlert;
00023                 theTextField.autocapitalizationType = UITextAutocapitalizationTypeWords;
00024                 theTextField.autocorrectionType = UITextAutocorrectionTypeNo;
00025                 theTextField.contentVerticalAlignment = UIControlContentVerticalAlignmentCenter;
00026                 theTextField.textAlignment = UITextAlignmentCenter;
00027         [self addSubview:theTextField];
00028         self.textField = theTextField;
00029         [theTextField release];
00030     }
00031     return self;
00032 }
00033 - (void)show
00034 {
00035     [textField becomeFirstResponder];
00036     [super show];
00037 }
00038 - (NSString *)enteredText
00039 {
00040     return textField.text;
00041 }
